name: the-plausible-post
description: A news-satire site built with Eleventy

scripts.webp: find src/assets/images -type f \( -iname '*.jpg' -o -iname '*.jpeg' -o -iname '*.png' \) -not -iname 'favicon*' -not -iname 'android-chrome*' -not -iname 'apple-touch-icon*' -not -iname 'safari-pinned-tab*' -print0 | while IFS= read -r -d '' f; do out="${f%.*}.webp"; ffmpeg -y -i "$f" -vf "scale=min(1600\\,iw):-2" -vcodec libwebp -q:v 75 -preset default -an -map_metadata -1 "$out"; done
